snippet: At a computer security conference in Miami, a hacker showed security experts how he was able to intercept the radio communications between Silver Spring Networks, a maker of smart grid technology, and its clients, which include major utilities like...
abstract: At a computer security conference in Miami, a hacker showed security experts how he was able to intercept the radio communications between Silver Spring Networks, a maker of smart grid technology, and its clients, which include major utilities like Pacific Gas and Electric and Pepco Holdings.

headline.main: A Hacker Says Smart Grid Can Be Penetrated
